ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: My God, my God, why have you forsaken me?...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Jesus cried out... “My God, my God, why have you forsaken me?”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: But I am a worm and not a man, scorned by everyone, despised by the people. All who see me mock me; they hurl insults, shaking their heads: “He trusts in the LORD,” they say, “let the LORD rescue him...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Those who passed by hurled insults... In the same way the chief priests, the teachers of the law and the elders mocked him... He trusts in God. Let God rescue him now...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: I am poured out like water, and all my bones are out of joint... My mouth is dried up like a potsherd, and my tongue sticks to the roof of my mouth...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Later, knowing that everything had now been finished, and so that Scripture would be fulfilled, Jesus said, “I am thirsty.”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: ...they pierce my hands and my feet.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: There they crucified him... and, as another scripture says, “They will look on the one they have pierced.”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: All my bones are on display; people stare and gloat over me.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: The people stood watching, and the rulers even sneered at him...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: They divide my clothes among them and cast lots for my garment.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...they took his clothes, dividing them... “Let’s decide by lot who will get it.” This happened that the scripture might be fulfilled...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: Into your hands I commit my spirit...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Jesus called out... “Father, into your hands I commit my spirit.”... he breathed his last.]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: Ruthless witnesses come forward; they question me on things I know nothing about.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Then some stood up and gave this false testimony against him...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: My friends and companions avoid me because of my wounds; my neighbors stay far away.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: But all those who knew him, including the women who had followed him from Galilee, stood at a distance, watching these things.]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: Even my close friend... one who shared my bread, has turned against me.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ‘He who shared my bread has turned against me.’... dipping the piece of bread, he gave it to Judas...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: Those who hate me without reason outnumber the hairs of my head...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ‘They hated me without reason.’]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: They put gall in my food and gave me vinegar for my thirst.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...offered Jesus wine to drink, mixed with gall... filled it with wine vinegar... offered it to Jesus to drink.]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: In return for my friendship they accuse me, but I am a man of prayer.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Jesus said, “Father, forgive them...”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: I offered my back to those who beat me... I did not hide my face from mocking and spitting.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: Then they spit in his face... he had Jesus flogged... They spit on him...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: ...his appearance was so disfigured... his form marred...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...he made himself nothing... humbled himself... to death on a cross!]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: He was despised and rejected by mankind, a man of suffering...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: He came to that which was his own, but his own did not receive him... But the whole crowd shouted, “Away with this man!...”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: Surely he took up our pain and bore our suffering...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: “He took up our infirmities and bore our diseases.”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: But he was pierced for our transgressions... by his wounds we are healed.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...Christ died for us... “by his wounds you have been healed.”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: ...the LORD has laid on him the iniquity of us all.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: “He himself bore our sins”... For “you were like sheep going astray,”...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: He was oppressed and afflicted, yet he did not open his mouth...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: When he was accused... he gave no answer... Jesus made no reply...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: By oppression and judgment he was taken away... for the transgression of my people he was punished.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: “He was led like a sheep to the slaughter... In his humiliation he was deprived of justice...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: He was assigned a grave with the wicked, and with the rich in his death, though he had done no violence...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...there came a rich man... Joseph... asked for Jesus’ body... placed it in his own new tomb...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: Yet it was the LORD’s will to crush him and cause him to suffer, and though the LORD makes his life an offering for sin...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: so Christ was sacrificed once to take away the sins of many...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: ...my righteous servant will justify many, and he will bear their iniquities.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...so also one righteous act resulted in justification and life for all people... through the obedience of the one man the many will be made righteous.]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: ...and was numbered with the transgressors. For he bore the sin of many, and made intercession for the transgressors.]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: They crucified two rebels with him... [“He was numbered with the transgressors.”]... Jesus said, “Father, forgive them...”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: After the sixty-two ‘sevens,’ the Anointed One will be put to death...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...Son of Man must suffer much and be rejected?”... There they crucified him...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: So they paid me thirty pieces of silver. And the LORD said to me, “Throw it to the potter”...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...thirty pieces of silver... Judas threw the money... they decided to use the money to buy the potter’s field...]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: They will look on me, the one they have pierced, and they will mourn for him...]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ...one of the soldiers pierced Jesus’ side... “They will look on the one they have pierced.”]

ot_prophecy: [BSB Text Approximated: “Strike the shepherd, and the sheep will be scattered...”]
nt_fulfillment: [BSB Text Approximated: ‘I will strike the shepherd, and the sheep... will be scattered.’”... Then all the disciples deserted him and fled.]
